```{r}
county_poll = read_excel("./data/nycounty_results.xlsx") %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  mutate(
    results = ifelse(biden_pct > 0.5, "D", "R") #D stands for Democratic party win and R stands for Republican Party win
  ) %>%
  select(county, results)

county_poll
```
